title: Chronopolis
brief_description:
Chronopolis is a city lost in space. The inhabitants are immortal and they attempt to relieve their boredom by manufacturing time. They are all awaiting a liberating cataclysm which will break the monotony of their endless lives. During one of their manufactured moments, the Chronossians meet a human being in the person of a mountaineer.

Credits: Producer, Marcelle Ponti ; director, Piotr Kamler ; writer, Piotr Kamler, Gabrielle Althen ; photography, Piotr Kamler ; music, Luc Ferrari.
Cast: Michel Lonsdale [narration].
